title: NEWS: Disney To Pay $10 Million Fine for Collecting Children’s Data on YouTube
description:

content:
According to Variety, Disney has agreed to pay a $10 million civil penalty for collecting children’s data on YouTube.

author: AP
title: Trump hosts tech titans - but not Musk - at White House dinner
description: President Trump hosted tech leaders at the White House, showcasing AI research and investments. He emphasized the financial commitments from companies like Meta, Apple, Google, and Microsoft.
